greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: To get a(n), start with m=n, let p = largest prime < m, set m = m-p if m>0, or m=m+p if m <= 0; repeat until p=2 has been processed; set a(n) = m.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 0..100003
maple: for i from 1 to n do
if a>0 then a:=a-p else a:=a+p; fi;
program: (PARI) A215029(n) = if(n<=2,n,my(mp=precprime(n-1),d=n); while(mp>0, if(d>0, d -= mp, d += mp); mp = precprime(mp-1)); (d)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 28 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 05 2012
